item.title: My wife and I have been Sukin fans for more than two years and...
item.description:
old design


new design

My wife and I have been Sukin fans for more than two years and absolutely love it when they decided to update their design.

If you looked at the first photo of the product (2012) carefully you can notice they are indeed two different products (Purifying and Protein shampoo) however when you are in a rush, it is easy to mistake one product from another. It happened to me before as I was in a rush trying to get Protein shampoo only to realized that I actually bought the Purifying shampoo instead.

The problem is rather clear, the font is not as easy to read - as both starts with capital P and I was browsing through the whole bunch of other Sukin products (yes, the images are different, but if you have been browsing through all other Sukin products which have very similar design, it is very easy to mistake the product).

Compare this to the new photo (2013). You noticed that there are some small minor differences but it gives so much more clarity. The font is way more readable and the colour bar at the bottom helped identified the item even faster.

Small changes that actually made a huge difference :)
